title: Lazy Lizard Restaurant: A Family-Friendly Dining Spot
blurb: Enjoy home-style food and drinks in a relaxed setting.
description: Lazy Lizard is a restaurant that offers a relaxed and family-friendly dining experience. With a focus on home-style food and a variety of drinks, it's a great place for families to gather and enjoy a meal together. The restaurant provides a comfortable atmosphere where parents can unwind while kids enjoy the menu options. It is designed to cater to families looking for a casual dining experience with a diverse menu to suit different tastes. The venue also hosts events and happenings, making it a vibrant spot for the community. The restaurant aims to provide a welcoming environment for families and individuals alike.
price_display: Varies according to menu item. Kids dine free every weekend & PH.
address_display: 7 Ang Mo Kio Street 66 #01-09 & #01-12, Flora Vista, Singapore 567708

title: Little Lazy Lizard - Bukit Timah Family Dining
blurb: Family-friendly dining at Bukit Timah Road, Singapore.
description: Little Lazy Lizard at Bukit Timah Road offers a relaxed and family-friendly dining experience. Enjoy a diverse menu in a comfortable setting, perfect for gatherings with loved ones. The restaurant provides a welcoming atmosphere for families looking to enjoy a meal together. With a variety of dishes to choose from, there's something for everyone to enjoy. The location is easily accessible and provides a convenient dining option for residents and visitors alike. The restaurant aims to provide a memorable dining experience for all its guests.
price_display: Varies according to menu item. Kids dine free every weekend & PH.

title: Canopy Jurong Lake Gardens Dining Experience
blurb: Dine in nature with lakeside tranquility at Canopy.
description: Canopy at Jurong Lake Gardens offers a unique dining experience surrounded by lush greenery and a tranquil lakeside atmosphere. It's the perfect spot for a serene day out, offering a brunch menu with outlet-exclusive items. Enjoy dining amidst nature's beauty, making it an ideal destination for families and individuals seeking a peaceful escape. The biophilic backdrop enhances the dining experience, creating a refreshing and relaxing environment for all visitors. Perfect for families looking for a relaxing dining experience.

title: Bee’s Knees at The Garage Cafe & Bistro in Gardens
blurb: Fun, laid-back cafe & bistro in Botanic Gardens.
description: Bee’s Knees is a fun, laid-back cafe & bistro concept that draws inspiration from the highly social, evolved behaviour of bees. The first Bee’s Knees opened in 2017 at The Garage, Singapore Botanic Gardens, fast becoming a hot spot for the simplest most joyous occasions in our lives: pet owners to chill with their furkids al fresco, parents to dine in peace while their little ones totter about, and a cozy respite for social get-togethers. Dig in to comfort food elevated to be hearty and satisfying with South East Asian touches. With a wholesome and diverse menu with vegetarian options, the little ones, the health-conscious, the indulgent, and the alcoholic all get something under one hive.
address_display: Cluny Park Rd, Level 1 The Garage, 50, Singapore 257488

title: Jimmy Monkey Cafe & Bar - PLQ
blurb: Authentic Melbourne cafe lifestyle, open daily.
description: Jimmy Monkey Cafe & Bar brings the authentic Melbourne cafe lifestyle to Singapore. The PLQ location is open daily from 8AM to 10PM, next to an outdoor playground. Enjoy specialty coffee, delicious brunch options, and a relaxed atmosphere perfect for families and individuals alike. A great spot for a casual meal or a coffee break.
address_display: 2 Paya Lebar Rd, #01-10 Park Place Residences - next to playground, Singapore 409053

title: Super Loco Robertson Quay Mexican Cantina
blurb: Cosy Mexican cantina in Robertson Quay neighbourhood.
description: Located in Robertson Quay, Super Loco offers Mexican cuisine in a vibrant setting. The restaurant features colorful street posters reminiscent of Mexico City's barrios. It's a family-friendly riverside spot for weekend brunch or lunch and dinner. The venue is known for its lively atmosphere and is suitable for families and even furry friends looking for a place to dine and relax by the Singapore River. The restaurant provides a cozy environment for enjoying Mexican food.
datetime_display: Mon - Wed: 5pm - 11pm, Thu: 11:30pm - 11pm, Fri: 11:30am - 11:30pm, Sat: 10am - 11:30pm, Sun: 10am - 11pm

title: Ola Beach Club: Beachfront Dining
blurb: Enjoy watersports and dining by the beach!
description: Ola Beach Club offers a variety of watersports activities suitable for families and kids, including jet skiing, stand-up paddleboarding, and kayaking. Relax on the beach with Hawaiian-inspired cuisine and refreshing drinks. The club provides a family-friendly atmosphere with a dedicated kids' menu and beach games. Enjoy the sun, sand, and sea with a range of activities for all ages. Perfect for a day of fun and relaxation by the beach, with options for both adventurous watersports and laid-back dining experiences. The venue is designed to cater to families looking for a memorable beachside experience.

title: Jovis Cafe: A Family-Friendly Dining Experience
blurb: Cosy cafe near Clementi with mains, coffee & desserts.
description: Jovis Cafe is a family-friendly and work-friendly cafe located near Clementi. We offer an extensive menu of mains, coffee, alcohol, and desserts suitable for all ages. Our mission is to create a place where beautiful memories with loved ones are made. We provide free Wi-Fi, power plugs, books, and magazines, making it perfect for dates, study sessions, and family dinners. Come and enjoy a relaxing and welcoming atmosphere with a variety of food and beverage options for everyone in the family.

title: Quentin's Eurasian Restaurant Dining Experience
blurb: Enjoy authentic Eurasian cuisine in a family setting.
description: Quentin's Eurasian Restaurant offers a unique dining experience with traditional Eurasian dishes. The restaurant provides a family-friendly atmosphere, making it a great place to enjoy a meal with loved ones. The menu features a variety of flavorful dishes, showcasing the rich culinary heritage of the Eurasian community. From classic stews to spicy curries, there's something for everyone to enjoy. The restaurant is known for its warm hospitality and commitment to serving delicious, authentic Eurasian cuisine. Perfect for families looking to explore new flavors and create lasting memories.
address_display: 139 Ceylon Rd, Level 1 Eurasian Heritage Gallery, Singapore 429744

title: NOM Bistro: Family-Friendly Dining with Play Area
blurb: Modern cuisine with a mini dragon play area for kids.
description: NOM Bistro, located at Macpherson Community Club, offers modern cuisine with a twist. Appetizers include luncheon meat strips and chicken skin crisps. The salted egg pasta features prawns. The Double Trouble Burger has succulent patties. There is a kids menu available. A key feature is the indoor play area with a slide resembling the Toa Payoh Dragon Playground, providing a safe environment for children while parents dine. Expect to spend between $15 to $25 per head. The bistro exudes a sense of calmness away from the city environment.
address_display: 400 Paya Lebar Way, Level 1 MacPherson Community Club, Singapore 379131

title: Marché Mövenpick Family Dining Experience
blurb: Enjoy fresh market fare with a special kids' menu!
description: Marché Mövenpick offers a family-friendly dining experience where parents can enjoy fresh market cuisine while kids can choose from the Picky Kids’ Menu. The restaurant provides a relaxed atmosphere suitable for families with young children. The Picky Kids' Menu includes a variety of options designed to appeal to children's tastes, ensuring a satisfying meal for everyone. The restaurant focuses on fresh ingredients and a welcoming environment for families to dine together. The family special is available all day, making it a convenient option for lunch or dinner. The restaurant aims to provide a pleasant and stress-free dining experience for families.

title: Marché Mövenpick Restaurants - Picky Kids’ Menu
blurb: Family-friendly dining options available for kids.
description: Marché Mövenpick Restaurants offer a Picky Kids’ Menu designed to cater to the tastes of younger diners. The menu includes a variety of options suitable for children, ensuring a pleasant dining experience for the whole family. The restaurants provide a welcoming atmosphere for families, making it a convenient choice for parents looking for a place to eat with their kids. The Picky Kids’ Menu aims to provide balanced and appealing meals for children, with options that are both nutritious and enjoyable. The restaurants also offer a range of other dishes suitable for adults, ensuring that everyone in the family can find something to their liking. The focus is on fresh ingredients and quality preparation, providing a satisfying dining experience for all ages. The restaurants are designed to be family-friendly, with comfortable seating and a relaxed atmosphere.
datetime_display: Mon - Thu: 11am - 10pm, Fri & PH Eve: 11am - 11pm, Sat: 10am - 11pm, Sun & PH: 10am - 10pm

title: Marché Mövenpick Marketplace Picky Kids' Menu
blurb: Healthy market options at a special price!
description: Children (between 80cm to 140cm in height) get to choose from our healthy market options at a special price! Includes a 30cl of juice or soft drink and a fun-sized ice cream in a cone! Available at 313@somerset, Suntec City, and VivoCity.

description: Whisk & Paddle at Punggol offers a unique pet-friendly outdoor dining experience. Enjoy a relaxing atmosphere with your furry friends while savoring delicious food and drinks. The cafe provides a scenic view and a comfortable setting for families and pet owners alike. It's a great place to unwind and enjoy quality time with your loved ones and pets. The outdoor seating area is spacious and well-maintained, making it ideal for a casual meal or a special occasion. The menu features a variety of options to cater to different tastes, ensuring a satisfying dining experience for everyone.

title: Whisk & Paddle at Bukit Gombak Park
blurb: Visit Whisk & Paddle at Bukit Gombak Park.
description: Whisk & Paddle is located at Bukit Gombak Park. Enjoy the scenic views while dining. Note that this location is not pet-friendly. Visit our Facebook page for frequent updates on our operation especially during Public Holidays to avoid disappointment. For table reservations, please call respective outlets. Walk-in only on Sat/Sun/PH/Eve of PH, no reservation.

title: Lawry's The Prime Rib - Kids Dine Free Sundays
blurb: Kids dine free on Sundays with adult main courses.
description: Lawry's The Prime Rib offers a special promotion where kids can dine for free on Sundays. With every two adult à la carte main courses or set menus ordered, two children aged 12 and below can enjoy a complimentary 3-course kids set menu. This dine-in offer is perfect for families looking to enjoy a quality meal together in a sophisticated setting. Please note that the offer is not valid on public holidays, eve of public holidays and other special occasions. Check the terms and conditions for full details and blackout dates.
price_display: Varies according to menu item. Kids dine free on Sundays.

Perfect for a family outing or a casual meal with friends, Little Farms Bistro provides a welcoming environment and exceptional service.

title: Open Farm Community Urban Farm and Restaurant
blurb: Fresh food from farm to table
description: Open Farm Community is a unique urban farm and restaurant that offers a variety of experiences. It features a working farm where visitors can learn about sustainable agriculture, as well as a restaurant that serves dishes made with fresh, locally-sourced ingredients. The venue is suitable for families and individuals interested in experiencing farm-to-table dining and learning about urban farming. It also hosts garden weddings and corporate events, providing a unique and natural setting for celebrations and gatherings. The farm aims to connect people with nature and promote sustainable living through its various offerings.
keyword tag: farm, nature, farm to table, fresh

title: Beauty in The Pot Hotpot Experience
blurb: Nourishing soup bases with rich flavours and benefits.
description: Beauty in The Pot offers a hotpot experience inspired by the culture of food for health. The restaurant provides nourishing soup bases that promise rich flavours coupled with abundant benefits. It's a family-friendly dining experience where everyone can enjoy a comforting and healthy meal together. The hotpot ingredients are fresh and of high quality, ensuring a delightful culinary experience for all ages. The ambiance is designed to be inviting and relaxing, making it a perfect spot for family gatherings and celebrations. The restaurant caters to various dietary preferences and offers a range of options to suit different tastes.

title: Tiong Bahru Bakery Safari – Dempsey Hill Get Back
blurb: Get back to nature at Tiong Bahru Bakery Safari!
description: Tiong Bahru Bakery Safari is located opposite the Singapore Botanical Gardens and within walking distance of Tanglin Mall and Dempsey Hill. The cafe is open daily with free car parking and a children’s playground. Tiong Bahru Bakery Safari was awarded Best Family-Friendly Restaurant for Love Local Awards 2024! There is an outdoor playground, jungle greenery to explore and an edible garden to get busy in. You can tuck into a menu packed with healthy dishes made from fruits and herbs harvested straight from the on-site garden. Tiong Bahru Bakery Safari is also pet friendly.

title: Café Melba: A Community Hub for Families & Friends
blurb: Lifestyle café with family-friendly vibe and spacious areas.
description: Café Melba is a lifestyle café in Singapore, inspired by the vibrant influences of Melbourne and Asia. We blend casual dining with a family-friendly vibe, offering quality coffee, fresh pizzas, sandwiches, and select Asian dishes in a relaxed setting with spacious outdoor areas. As a hub for families, friends, and community events, we combine Eastern and Western traditions to create inclusive, memorable experiences, striving to be a trendsetter in Singapore’s café scene. Café Melba is a lifestyle café in Singapore, inspired by the vibrant influences of Melbourne and Asia. We blend casual dining with a family-friendly vibe, offering quality coffee, fresh pizzas, sandwiches, and select Asian dishes in a relaxed setting with spacious outdoor areas. As a hub for families, friends, and community events, we combine Eastern and Western traditions to create inclusive, memorable experiences, striving to be a trendsetter in Singapore’s café scene.

title: La Nonna
blurb: Kids eat free with each accompanying adult purchase.
description: Enjoy a family meal at La Nonna where kids can dine for free every Sunday. With each accompanying adult meal purchase, children can choose either an 8-inch pizza or a small pasta dish from the kids' menu. This promotion is perfect for families looking to enjoy a delicious Italian meal together in a relaxed and welcoming atmosphere. La Nonna offers a variety of pasta and pizza options, ensuring there's something for everyone to enjoy. This offer is available at all La Nonna outlets.
price_display: Varies according to menu item. Kids dine free on Sundays.

title: The Coastal Settlement: Rustic Charm Gatherings
blurb: Rustic charm for intimate gatherings and special events.
description: The Coastal Settlement offers a unique rustic charm perfect for intimate gatherings and special events. The venue provides a serene environment with indoor and outdoor spaces suitable for various occasions. It's an ideal location for families looking to celebrate milestones or enjoy a relaxed outing. The venue features vintage decor and lush greenery, creating a memorable experience for all attendees. The space is versatile and can accommodate both small and large groups, ensuring a comfortable and enjoyable setting for any event. The Coastal Settlement aims to provide a welcoming atmosphere for families and friends to come together and create lasting memories.

title: The Pantry Dempsey: Family-Friendly Dining Experience
blurb: Enjoy family meals at Dempsey with kids play area.
description: The Pantry offers a relaxed and family-friendly dining experience with a menu featuring a variety of comfort foods and healthy options. The restaurant provides a casual atmosphere, perfect for families with young children. The menu includes dishes suitable for different dietary needs and preferences, ensuring a pleasant experience for everyone. The ambiance is warm and inviting, making it an ideal spot for a casual family meal. The restaurant is known for its use of fresh, locally sourced ingredients, providing a delicious and wholesome dining experience. The setting is both comfortable and stylish, creating a welcoming environment for all ages.

title: PS.Cafe East Coast Park - Seaside Dining Venue
blurb: Bright, airy space with seaside-inspired design.
description: PS.Cafe By The Sea, located in East Coast Park, offers a laid-back summer beach house vibe with white-washed walls and ocean blue upholstery. The menu features PS. classics and an extensive selection of seafood dishes. Guests can enjoy their meal inside with sea views or outdoors in the breezy patio dining area. Perfect for lazy brunches or evening dining. Reservations are not available on weekends and public holidays until 5.30pm, walk-ins are welcome during these times.
datetime_display: Sun - Thu & PH: 8am - 10pm, Fri, Sat & Eve of PH: 8am - 10.30pm

title: Tipsy Unicorn: Beach Club Paradise in Sentosa
blurb: Dazzling beach club with curated events and delights.
description: Tipsy Unicorn is a dazzling beach club nestled in Sentosa, creating spectacular moments through curated events, entertainment, fitness, and exceptional culinary delights. Set against a stunning beachfront backdrop, it offers an unforgettable trip to paradise. Enjoy basking in the golden rays or dancing under the enchanting moonlight. The venue provides a vibrant atmosphere suitable for families looking for a unique beach experience with various activities and dining options. It's perfect for those seeking a blend of relaxation and entertainment in a picturesque setting.
datetime_display: Sun - Thu: 11am - 10pm, Fri - Sat: 11am - 12am (Adults only (18+) after 6pm on Fri - Sun, eve of PH)

title: Frankie & Fern's: Brunch, Coffee, and Dinner Spot
blurb: Brunch and coffee daily, dinner Fri-Sun, plus last Mondays.
description: Frankie & Fern's offers a delightful dining experience with brunch and coffee available every day. Dinner service is available from Friday to Sunday, providing a perfect setting for family meals. Additionally, they are open every last Monday of the month for dinner, making it a unique spot for a monthly treat. The restaurant aims to create a welcoming atmosphere for families and individuals alike, with a focus on quality food and friendly service. Enjoy a relaxed meal in a cozy environment, perfect for a casual outing or a special occasion.

title: East Coast Commune
blurb: Brunch with your little one by the beach
description: Located in the heart of East Coast Park, East Coast Commune is a charming, sunlit café that blends laid-back coastal vibes with a menu full of fresh, wholesome flavors. Perfect for a post-ride coffee or a slow weekend brunch, the café offers everything from hearty breakfast plates and vibrant grain bowls to house-made bakes and specialty brews. Just steps from the beach, East Coast Commune is pet-friendly, family-friendly, and always welcoming. Whether you're fueling up or winding down, it’s a perfect pitstop by the sea.

title: Arbora Hilltop Garden Dining Experience at Faber
blurb: Family-friendly oasis nestled in Mount Faber Peak.
description: Arbora is a family-friendly dining destination nestled within the lush greenery of Mount Faber Peak. Refreshed with a brand-new canopy, it offers a cool and breezy atmosphere for all-day casual dining. Open from 11 AM to 9.30 PM daily, Arbora is perfect for family gatherings, featuring a spacious and playful setting where kids can explore while parents relax and enjoy delicious food. The restaurant provides a unique hilltop garden dining experience, making it an ideal spot for families seeking a relaxing and enjoyable meal amidst nature. It's a great place for kids to have fun and for parents to unwind.
address_display: 109 Mount Faber Rd, Mount Faber Peak, Singapore 099203

title: Honest Food in Small Batches Experience
blurb: Quality and artisanality in everything we offer.
description: Honest to goodness, it is our commitment to quality and artisanality in everything we offer to you and your little ones. Comfortable classics don't need to be overprocessed, think in-house sourdough, fresh pasta, and bakes. As we continually gain inspiration from what’s grown around us, escape from the hustle and bustle to a space that feels like a haven rather than an interruption to the iconic gardens.

blurb: Healthy and delicious meals in a family-friendly space.

title: Platform 1094: A Wizarding Dining Experience
blurb: A magical fantasy world with mystical decor.
description: Step into Platform 1094 and be transported to a magical fantasy world. The decor and food are specially designed to exude an air of magic, perfect for families and kids who love wizardry. Enjoy a unique dining experience with Insta-worthy backgrounds and props. It's a great place for families to enjoy a themed dining experience. The restaurant offers a unique and immersive environment that caters to both adults and children, making it a memorable outing for all ages. The magical theme is sure to captivate the imagination of younger visitors.

title: Fusion Spoon at Botanic Garden Self-Order Kiosk
blurb: Order foods & drinks at our self-order & payment kiosk
description: Fusion Spoon at Botanic Garden offers a self-order and payment kiosk for a convenient dining experience. Customers can select dine-in or takeaway options, choose food and drink items, confirm their order, and choose a mode of payment. After collecting the receipt, customers wait for their queue number to be called and collect their orders from the designated collection point. There is no service charge, and customers are encouraged to return their trays to the tray return station. The venue offers a variety of food and drink options suitable for families and children visiting the Botanic Gardens, including bingsu and waffle ice cream available at the Bingsu Corner. This family-friendly dining spot provides a hassle-free experience for parents and kids alike.
address_display: Singapore Botanic Gardens, Tanglin Gate, 1 Cluny Rd, #B1-00, Singapore 259569

title: Baker & Cook - Dempsey
blurb: Dempsey Playground Reopens!
description: Baker & Cook Dempsey offers a delightful experience for families with its reopened playground. The playground provides a safe and fun environment for children to play while parents can enjoy the bakery's offerings. It features various play structures designed to entertain kids of different ages. The reopening is scheduled from July to September, making it a perfect spot for a family outing. Enjoy freshly baked goods and coffee while the kids have a blast at the playground. The venue is family-friendly and welcomes children of all ages to enjoy the facilities.
price_display: Prices vary according to menu item

title: Hard Rock Cafe Singapore - Orchard Road Location
blurb: Located in Orchard Road, Singapore's shopping hub.
description: Hard Rock Cafe Singapore is located at the beginning of Orchard Road, Singapore's premier shopping destination. The cafe offers a family-friendly dining experience with a rock 'n' roll atmosphere. It features a restaurant, bar, and a Rock Shop where you can purchase Hard Rock Cafe merchandise. The venue is accessible by car and public transportation, with parking readily available for cars. While bus parking facilities are not available, the central location makes it easy to reach. Enjoy classic American cuisine and live music in a vibrant setting suitable for families and music lovers of all ages. The cafe provides a unique blend of dining and entertainment.
price_display: Varies according to menu item. Kids dine free on weekends, 12pm - 5pm

title: Huber's Bistro: A Culinary Experience for Families

Please note that the bistro is closed on Mondays, including public holidays that fall on Mondays, and reservations are not accepted.
